thread.title: Our 5 favorite John Lennon lyrics, in honor of the icon's would-be 75th birthday
thread.title_full: Our 5 favorite John Lennon lyrics, in honor of the icon's would-be 75th birthday

author: More Content Now staff
title: Our 5 favorite John Lennon lyrics, in honor of the icon's would-be 75th birthday
text: Our 5 favorite John Lennon lyrics, in honor of the icon's would-be 75th birthday Comment By More Content Now staff Greece Post By More Content Now staff Posted Oct. 9, 2015 at 2:54 PM By More Content Now staff Posted Oct. 9, 2015 at 2:54 PM Â» Read more X The world lost John Lennon far too early: The astonishingly talented Beatles musician and lyricist from Liverpool was only 40 when he was murdered in New York City in 1980. The songwriter would have celebrated his 75th birthday today, and in his honor, we're rounding up some of our favorite Lennon lyrics from his time with the Beatles as well as his solo discography. Click through the gallery above to see them all. And check out this video from Reuters covering an attempt earlier this week by Lennon fans in New York City to form the world's biggest human peace sign. By More Content Now staff Greece Post By More Content Now staff Posted Oct. 9, 2015 at 2:54 PM
